developers.title: Apply to academy
developers.text: Entrance test results define a priority list of candidates. We accept 20 candidates with highest marks into academy.

frontend.title: Apply to academy
frontend.text: Start your career in software development with the intense program at Sourcery for Front-End Developers.

testers.title: Apply to academy
testers.text: Set your inner tester free and apply to empower yourself with the top-notch studies for the future Test Engineers!
